name: Gunfu
description:
GunFu is one of the most exciting shooter games in 2020, bringing a simple user interface with a fast-paced action gameplay and massive ability to scale (with a capacity of hosting up to 1,000 players on 1 server).

Competitive and fun, the goal of the game is to be the best among all the players. To do so, you have to eliminate as many players as possible within one session. You can start doing that by using some basic weapons and gradually improve to unlock new advanced weapons and ramp up your killstreak progress. You can purchase a shotgun, a sniper rifle, heavy machinery and many other weapons.

Every time you die, you are re-spawned to level 0 as a starting point. Each level has its own unique set of weapons, which is why you need to choose which one to use carefully until you get enough kills to progress to the next level.

How to play:

  1. Use your mouse to move and navigate. Your character will go in the direction your mouse is pointed at.
  2. Use your left-click to shoot.
  3. Use your right-click to dash.
  4. Select and browse through different weapons at each level by using your mouse.
